body_html:
@yuquanle
Hi,
The problem is that .so extensions do not work on windows. So what you'd need to do is build Tensorflow on Windows as it is shown here:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r0.12/tensorflow/contrib/cmake

I will execute that step list in the upcoming days and report back to you. In the mean time, enjoy TF :)!

body:
@yuquanle 
Hi,
The problem is that .so extensions do not work on windows. So what you'd need to do is build Tensorflow on Windows as it is shown here:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r0.12/tensorflow/contrib/cmake

I will execute that step list in the upcoming days and report back to you. In the mean time, enjoy TF :)!
